fullText: Ayad Akhtar's Pulitzer Prize-winning drama about a Muslim-American lawyer's identity crisis is a searing examination of post-9/11 prejudices that builds to a shocking climax.
dtliExcerpt: Ayad Akhtar's Pulitzer Prize-winning drama about a Muslim-American lawyer's identity crisis is a searing examination of post-9/11 prejudices that builds to a shocking climax.
